description:
Today marks the 100th anniversary of the passing of the 19th Amendment. In gratitude to the American women who fought for the right to vote, we speak to Raissa Breta単a about the relationship between fashion and the 20th century suffrage movement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
